name: K.B. II, K.B. and B.B., Respondents v. C.B.F., Petitioner

parties: K.B. II, K.B. and B.B., Respondents v. C.B.F., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of January 2004, the petition for allowance of appeal is hereby GRANTED LIMITED to the issue of:
Whether grandparents have standing to seek custody under 23 Pa.C.S. § 5313(b) absent a finding that the child is substantially at risk, or that the parent is unfit, or that the child is dependent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
842 A.2d 917
K.B. II, K.B. and B.B., Respondents v. C.B.F., Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 2, 2004.
